title: Kevin Volland - Soccer News, Rumors, & Updates | FOX Sports
snippet: Impact Volland made his way back into team training during Friday's session. The forward will be asked to lead the line in a big role in the back half of the season following the departure of Kevin Behrens to Wolfsburg.

title: Nach Verletzung in Ingolstadt: Haugen bereits operiert
snippet: Auch er musste in Ingolstadt verletzt das Feld verlassen. Aufgrund der parallel gezeigten gelb-roten Karte, die Babak Rafati bei liga3-online.de als Fehlentscheidung bewertete, muss Kevin am letzten Spieltag ohnehin gesperrt passen.

title: Kevin Volland Soccer Stats & News
snippet: Volland will leave Union Berlin in the summer to rejoin his former club TSV 1860 Munich in the German third division, the club announced. "Kevin has made an important contribution to the Union - his experience was particularly valuable during a difficult sporting period.

title: Kevin Volland - Attack | Bayer 04
snippet: After four years at Bayer 04, Kevin Volland is joining top French club AS Monaco with immediate effect. The club, that only hired coach Niko Kovac last month, have bought out the 28-year-old Volland from his contract that was due to run to 30 ...
